sen.j: 石舞台古墳（いしぶたいこふん）は、奈良県明日香村にある古墳時代後期の古墳。
sen.e: Ishibutai-kofun Tumulus is a tumulus in the latter part of the Kofun period (the period of ancient burial mounds) located in Asuka-mura, Nara Prefecture.
Ishibutai-kofun Tumulus is a tumulus in the late Kofun period located in Asuka Village, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 昭和27年（1952年）3月27日、国特別史跡に指定される。
sen.e: It was designated as a special historical site by the Government on March 27, 1952.

sen.e: It has been called Ishibutai (Stone Stage) due to the shape of its megalithic (granite) burial chamber which has been exposed from olden times.
